title: Mablung, Soldier of Gondor (4U127)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Companion • Man
Strength:	6
Vitality:	3
Resistance:	6
Game Text:	Ring-bound. Ranger. To play, spot a Ring-bound Man. Skirmish: Exert Mablung to exhaust a roaming minion he is skirmishing.
Lore:	”'…we have a new errand on this journey….'”
Rarity:	U
